com.sindice.query
Class FieldRegexFilter

java.lang.Object
  com.sindice.query.FieldRegexFilter
All Implemented Interfaces:
HTTPParameter
public class FieldRegexFilter
extends java.lang.Object
implements HTTPParameter

For the named field, filter to include / exclude only the items matching the given regular expression. This is useful for explicit_content and implicit_content fields to include/exclude only the desired triples. If more than one filter is provided for the same field, an item will be filtered if it matches any query. Filters are not case sensitive.

Author:
Michele Mostarda (mostarda@fbk.eu)
